member.summary: Gets all setting provided by this provider.

member.name: T:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager
member.summary: This is the main interface that must be implemented to be able to get/store values of settings.

member.name: M:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager.GetSettingValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets current value of a setting. It gets the setting value, overwrited by application and the current user if exists.

member.name: M:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager.GetSettingValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets value of a setting.
member.typeparam: Type of the setting to get

member.name: M:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager.GetAllSettingValues
member.summary: Gets current values of all settings. It gets all setting values, overwrited by application and the current user if exists.

member.name: M:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager.GetAllSettingValuesForApplication
member.summary: Gets a list of all setting values specified for the application. It returns only settings those are explicitly set for the application. If a setting's default value is used, it's not included the result list. If you want to get current values of all settings, use method.

member.name: M:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager.GetAllSettingValuesForUser(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of all setting values specified for a user. It returns only settings those are explicitly set for the user. If a setting's value is not set for the user (for example if user uses the default value), it's not included the result list. If you want to get current values of all settings, use method.

member.summary: Changes setting for the application level.

member.name: M:Abp.Configuration.ISettingValueManager.ChangeSettingForUser(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Changes setting for a user.

member.name: T:Abp.Domain.Uow.IUnitOfWork
member.summary: Represents a transactional job (unit of work).

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.IUnitOfWork.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Opens database connection and begins transaction.

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.IUnitOfWork.Commit
member.summary: Commits transaction and closes database connection.

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.IUnitOfWork.Rollback
member.summary: Rollbacks transaction and closes database connection.

member.name: T:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkScope
member.summary: This class is used to create a manual unit of work scope.
member.remarks: can be used to mark a method as unit of work. Then the marked method will be a unit of work scope. But, somethimes you may want to restrict unit of work scope to a part of a method, then use this class.

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkScope.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new unit of work scope.

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkScope.Commit
member.summary: Commits the unit of work. If not commited, it's rolled back on .

member.name: P:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkScope.CurrentUow
member.summary: Gets current instance. It gets the right instance that is related to current thread.

member.name: T:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is used to indicate that declaring method is transactional (atomic) and should be considered as a unit of work. A method that has this attribute is intercepted, a database connection is opened and a transaction is started before call the method. At the end of method call, transaction is commited and all changes applied to the database if there is no exception, othervise it's rolled back.
member.remarks: This attribute has no effect if there is already a unit of work before calling this method, so this method uses the same transaction.

member.name: T:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkHelper
member.summary: A helper class to simplify unit of work process.

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkHelper.ShouldPerformUnitOfWork(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Determines if given method is a UnitOfWork method.
member.returns: True if should perform unit of work

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkHelper.IsRepositoryClass(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true if given type is a repository class (implements IRepository).

member.name: M:Abp.Domain.Uow.UnitOfWorkHelper.HasUnitOfWorkAttribute(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Returns true if given method has UnitOfWorkAttribute attribute.
